summary: Charming warm house is ready to host you here in multi cultural Parc Ex.  Short walk to Parc Jarry to watch Rogers cup and on major bus lines to metro and downtown
La chambre est spacieuse et lumineuse, dans un appartement partagée avec trois autres colocataires.
Grande chambre confortable située au sous-sol de notre maison. Une grande salle de bain avec douche, laveuse et sécheuse sont incluses.

Près d’un Métro, ligne orange. 10 minutes à pied. Quartier résidentiel Ahuntsic de Montréal. Centre nord. Stationnement facile dans la rue. Une chambre, lit double. 2 personnes maximum lors de ma présence: 1 chambre et 2 chambres lors de mon absence.  Convivial et chaleureux.
Very bright appartment and very cosy. 2 separate bedrooms (1 with a queen size and the other with a double sofa bed). Located in Verdun near promenade Wellington and its nice bars and restaurants.

Stunning Executive Condo in the Prestigious Hilton Embassy Suites Hotel.Ideally located in the heart of downtown & Old Montreal steps- Conference Center,Notre Dame Basilica,Old Port/Marina,China Town& Place Des Spectacles.Offers a bright & Spacious 1 bedroom unit of 750sf  with high end finishes,floor to ceiling windows,Cozy fireplace,Bathtub & 1 FREE Garage space.Building offers gym,restaurant,bar & extra pay parking.Minutes-highways,subway,nightlife,shopping & everything Montreal has to offer!

BRIGHT, MODERN, AND SPACIOUS UNIT AVAILABLE FOR RENT IN THE HEART OF BEAUTIFUL DOWNTOWN MONTREAL! Feel free to use my UBER or UBER EATS discount code during your stay! UBER Code: f8aw3 UBER EATS Code: eats-f8aw3

Le loft Jacques-Cartier offres courte terme des appartements  au design moderne, décoré avec goût, calme, confortable et lumineux, situé au cœur  du quartier PLATEAU MONT ROYAL sur la paisible rue CARTIER à deux pas du verdoyant parc LAFONTAINE, à quelques minutes de marche de la Avenue du MONT-ROYAL et à 10-15 minutes du centre ville. Nos appartements  ont tout ce vous cherchez: emplacement parfait, Stationnement privé inclus le tout à proximité des activités & services à prix abordable.

New Luxury and Modern condo in a new building in heart of Downtown, huge sunlit rooftop with swimming pool&bbq, close to Montreal’s Quartier des Spectacles, Quartier Latin and Old Montreal. Also 1 minute walk from Metro station.

Charming condo located in the heart of  Plateau Mont-Royal neighborhood. Fully equipped to accommodate 2 to 4 people. Close to transportation, shops and restaurants of Laval Avenue and Des Pins Avenue, one block from Prince Arthur (pedestrian street).

Nous vous proposons une très jolie chambre privée dans notre appartement composé de 2 chambres. L'appartement est idéalement situé au coeur du plateau à 2min de la station laurier et 5min de l'avenue Mont-Royal.

Nice apartment freshly renovated. located in a quiet neighborhood,. 10 minutes by car to go downtown Montreal.  Parking on the street is easy and free.   5 minutes to go to the metro/subway. (Metro Frontenac) During summer, access to BIXI (self-service bike) Easy to go to most of Montreal Point of interest in less than 30min.  4 stations to go Montreal metro main-hub (Berri-Uqam).  From there Orange and Yellow line.  Free unlimited WIFI with Netflix and Amazon Video in an AppleTV

- Fully furnished apartment in the heart of downtown Montreal - WIFI (high speed internet), stove, refrigerator and necessary furniture are included - Near Concordia University, Mcgill University, Metro Guy Concordia, hospitals & restaurant  - Indoor parking available on demand

BEAU CONDO AVEC TERRASSE AU COEUR DU PLATEAU MONT-ROYAL! 10 MIN A PIED DU MÉTRO...A QUELQUES PAS DU PARC LAFONTAINE ET DES SERVICES SUR LA  RUE MONT-ROYAL IDÉAL POUR ÉTRANGERS OU ÉTUDIANTS EN VISITE ET PEUT ÊTRE DISPONIBLE POUR 1 MOIS ET PLUS!
You can also use the kitchen, dining room, lounge, pool and terrace.

Hello! I will be glad to host you in my beautiful apartment. As you can see in the photos, the apartment is clean, brand new and it is just 3 minutes from the metro station Du College. The apartment has one double bed and one sofa convertible in one double  bed, a balcony, dishwasher, washer and dryer in the apartment and 2 common areas: a gym and a ping pong table.  There are parking spaces for visitors where you can park your car for free. You are 25 minutes from downtown by metro and 15 minutes by car. You have a super market 5 minutes by foot. Ideal for 3 to 4 persons maximum, 2 in the double bed and 2 in the sofa (2 slim persons). The TV doesn't have cable chain installed because I don't watch tv but you can connect your laptop to the TV and watch movies from the internet if you want.

Mon adorable petit appart. est situé dans le joli quartier du Plateau Mont-Royal. En plus de sa belle terrasse arrière, il a le parc Laurier en guise de cour (pétanque, table de ping-pong, piscine, chaises longues, ciné-étoiles, etc.) Vous trouverez à quelques pas du logement : l’avenue Laurier, Mont-Royal, le boul. St-Denis et St-Laurent avec tous les restos, bars et les boutiques branchés. Vous avez également un marché au coin de la rue.

Chambre dans un logement tranquille. Situé à quelques minutes de marche de la station de métro Charlevoix. Dans le quartier Pointe St-Charles, près du Canal Lachine, du marché Atwater ainsi que de plusieurs restaurants. La chambre inclut un bureau de travail ainsi que l'accès au espaces communs soit cuisine et salle à manger. Au plaisir de vous rencontrer!

Fantastic apartment in the heart of the Plateau area, just 3 min from the metro Mont-Royal station.  Enjoy the memory foam mattresses and the public parking nearby. We have 4 identical units in the same building, go check our other properties or book 2 units for bigger groups ;)  FabFours : #1 Antelope  #2 Love MTL #3 Fully Liscenced #4 BullsHead  Contact us, we are friendly and professional, always there to answer your questions!  MTL Vacation Rentals

Big bright apartment in one of Montreal's best neighbourhoods, Villeray Everything is close: - The famous Jean Talon market - The huge park Jarry - Plaza St Hubert - Little Italy with all its restaurants - and you will be 5 minutes walk from the metro Grocery stores, restaurants, cafés and bars within walking distance. Close to downtown by subway! The apartment is fully equipped, there is: kitchen, living room, comfy bedroom, baby bedroom, bathroom, balcony, private roof terrace and garage.

Nous sommes étudiants à Montréal et serions heureux de t'accueillir dans notre 4e chambre située au coeur du Plateau durant ton séjour à Montréal. A 5 min du centre-ville en métro. Bus, métro à 30 secondes à pieds, nombreux commerces, bars ...

Welcome to CozyPlateauOne! Large, Beautiful & Cosy apartment located in the heart of Plateau-Mont Royal on a quiet street.  2-5 minutes walking distance from Mont-Royal metro station & Laurier metro station 2-5 minutes walking distance from several good restaurants, bars, cafes, shops, groceries, stores, parks, bikes station, libraries, bus lines and many other commodities. 10-15 minutes from Downtown or several tourist attractions via public transportation. Free parking available on the street

Welcome to our bright and spacious ground floor apartment! My husband and I recently bought the property and have been working on designing it to be the most enjoyable space possible. We will be away for the summer and thought it would be a great opportunity to rent our space out to visitors!  If you are looking for a quiet place, in a trendy area, walking distance to grocery stores, the Jean Talon market, cafes, restaurants, bars and most importantly public transit this is your spot!

Mon logement est proche de tout ce que le mile-end a à offrir. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour le confort, la luminosité, l'emplacement. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.

Very nice unit located close to a 3 km long park by the St-Lawrence river.  Nearby by all services (grocery, drugstore, McDonald, corner store, gaz station, best pizza in Mtl steps away at Coronel, 4 bus lines 300 meters away that lead direct to downtown or to a subway station in less than 10 minutes).

Our stylish ground floor vast apartment (1450 sq ft) offers large and cosy rooms + a brand new WC and kitchen. It's very close to shops, grocery, subway station, regional market, etc.  A beautifully vegetated courtyard provides nature in the city.

Appartement moderne, très propre et confortable. Belle cuisine à votre disposition et accès laveuse/sécheuse.  Chambre située à deux pas du transport en commun et de toutes les commodités (supermarché, pharmacie, etc.).

Chambre avec grand lit, grande penderie et fauteuil dans un grand appartement au Rez de chaussée, dans le quartier de Villeray. Villeray est au nord de la ville, c'est le quartier où de plus en plus de gens déménagent car il est calme, convivial et proche du marché Jean-Talon. Il y a également épiceries, bars et cafés un peu partout en plus d'un très grand parc (parc Jarry). L'appartement est à 1 min à pied du métro Jarry donc vous pouvez vous rendre très rapidement n'importe où.

Fully furnished apartment/suite (1 bedroom+sitting room) totally renovated with all the modern conveniences while maintaining the charm of the century old building. Located on calm street 2 blocks to Laurier metro/subway station and 2 blocks from Av. Mont-Royal.

Our one-bedroom apartment offers you a place to relax, have fun and truly unwind from a long day of work. They have been renovated and feature modern and comfortable decor. Kitchens include a stove and a fridge. Enjoy your own private balcony while taking in the panorama of the city. Located in Downtown Montreal within walking distance to the Mount-Royal Mountain, McGill & Concordia Universities, bus & metro stations, shopping malls, hotels, and nightlife.

The perfect Airbnb for your vacation or business trip! It’s a clean place with fresh beddings, bath towels, pots & pans, coffee, Netflix, High-Speed WIFI. A fully equipped condo cleaned by professionals, nicely decorated, cold air conditioning, High speed internet, comfortable bed, crystal clean washroom, and much more. Located right above the metro and bus station, Airbnb is a travellers dream!! Hope to see you! Let us know if you have any questions :)

Bedroom in apartment shared with three other roommates. We are very relaxed and enjoy listening to music and cooking, we're very social but also like to do our own things as well. We are looking forward to having visitors :)   There are two wall sockets in the room, and there’s a temperature control on the wall for inside the room.  We have a washer and dryer for laundry available.  No smoking cigarettes inside but there is a back porch that is available. We are 420 friendly.

My place is right next to the beautiful Mont Royal and vibrant St-Laurent Street.  Schwartz's, McGill and plenty of bars, cafes and restaurants just around the corner. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the ambiance, the light and the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).

District Griffin - Beautiful condo 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom that comes with free parking & WiFi. Commune areas with fireplace, gym, pool, spa, sauna. Griffintown is a brand new neighborhood with plenty of restaurants, stores and grocery stores within reach. This place is conveniently located to all of Montreal attractions such as Old Port, downtown and the river. You won't be disappointed.

Centrally located in the West-Island of Montreal, 20 minutes from Down-Town & 15 mins. from P.E.Trudeau airport by car , 5 mins. drive (20 mins. walk) to local train station. Close to highways, numerous fast food & indian restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacy, park, lake & popular West-Island market. This Condo has  Bedrooms ...(Kitchen & bathroom is shared). Access to Fridge, Stove, Microwave & Kettle.etc.  Food & Parking upon request. Owner stays in the house & would love to welcome you ! .

Location-Location-Location! Beautiful interior designer 3 bedroom condo, fully furnished. Located in the heart & happening area of Montreal (Plateau Mont-Royal). Shops, restaurants, cafés, French bakeries, etc are around the corner. Four minute walk to subway stop. Located & walking distance between the two most beautiful city parks : Parc Lafontaine and Mount Royal mountain. Walking distance to downtown as well.  Bixi bicycle rentals are across the street along the city bicycle path.

This is a cozy studio artsy apartment in the heart of Montreal perfect for single travelers or couples, 5-15 minutes walk away from the beautiful Old Port and Old Montreal, Place des arts(where all the biggest festivals happen, like Just For Laughs) China Town, Gay Village, Jardim Gamblin, and two Metros, also if you're coming from the airport the bus #747 goes right by my apartment

Superbe appartement familial composé d'une grande pièce lumineuse (salon, salle à manger), de 2 chambres, d'une cuisine toute équipée et d'une salle de bain spacieuse. L'appartement a été entièrement rénové il y a quelques années, tout en gardant le charme des constructions traditionnelles du Plateau Mont Royal, à deux pas de l'avenue Laurier (tous commerces). Chez nous sera chez vous, merci d'en prendre soin : )

Décor avec ligne vive, éclatante et décontracté, appartement bien équipé; laveuse, sécheuse. Une chambre fermée avec grand lit(queen) neufs. Deux grand sofa-futons (queen)tout neuf avec literie très confortable dans deux grands salons séparable.

This is completely renovated appartment with an authentic 'Plateau' look that will make you experience Montreal as a local. Less than one minute walking from Sherbrooke metro station.   *** This place is ideal for families, so if you want to have more than 1 room, check the availability of the other rooms listed and book each room from my profile.

Unique apartment loft 1500 s.f. ideal for couples, family, friends or group. Many games available such as Pool table, ping pong, baby foot, dart game, etc. Close to great restos, boutiques, park, Jarry Park (rogers ATP and WTA master tennis Canada), Jean Talon public market, and much more in the neighbourhood VILLERAY. 1 Subway station from Little Italy, 2 stations from PLATEAU Mont-Royal, 5 from Downtown. Our 3 queen bed are very comfortable, brand new mastress. Welcome to Montreal!

QUIET, very clean, free wifii and 2 comfy queen beds in a newly renovated appartment on the 2nd floor of a duplex very close to downtown (13 min/car or 30 min/public transport) Sofa bed is not as comfortable as beds, but perfect if required Free street parking at all times. Close to grocery store and wallmart. This is NOT a party place. My neighbors are amazing and need to be respected at all times so i can continue having you over! so no noise after 11h if we want to keep them happy

Appartement situé à 5 minutes à marche tout aussi bien de la rue Saint-Laurent que de la rue Saint-Denis. À 3 minutes de marche vous trouverez aussi la rue Duluth réputée pour sa multitude et délicieux restaurants. Le métro Sherbrooke est à 8 minutes de marche.  Le quartier est très  calme et permet le repos et la relaxation mais son excellente localisation va donner accès rapidement aux fans de boites de nuit, mais aussi des endroits pour faire du shopping, de la randonnée ou du jogging.

Beautiful fully furnished all inclusive rooms are available for students at the Edison Residence, an innovative architecture building. Enjoy the convenience to live in downtown Montreal and having McGill University as your next door neighbor.

Salut salut,  Nous mettons à disposition une chambre avec un petit lit double pour la période du 1 aout au 31 aout. À deux pas du parc Jeanne-Mance et des métros Mont-royal/Sherbrooke. Vous partagerez l'appartement avec une espagnole et deux français.

Bienvenue !  Cet appartement très agréable à vivre et tout équipé, vous ravira par son confort et son emplacement. C'est la base idéale depuis laquelle explorer Montréal car toutes les attractions principales sont accessibles facilement.  Mon logement est proche des berges du fleuve, idéales pour de belles ballades ou pour le footing du matin. La station Verdun en métro (ligne verte) est à 2 minutes et vous ne rencontrerez aucune difficulté pour vous stationner en auto.

This apartment is very well situated for the plateau, in a calm and quiet street, a short walk down St-Denis brings you to the Sherbrooke Metro stop. St Laurent is 5 minutes the other direction with all of its nightlife and food.  The plateau is littered with small authentic restaurants from all corners of the world. Attractive street art, everything from large murals to intricate graffiti. Parks are never too far away.
Looking for a place to stay during the Montreal Grand Prix? We welcome you to be our guests and friends for the duration of this awesome Montreal event! Please see description for further details.
Renovated, warm and tastefully furnished. This apartment with lots of character is located on 2 floors. Amazing space! Monthly rentals only.

Beautiful apartment with a decoration based on the theme: Pop Art! An artist painted three stunning murals inside the apartment that will leave you speechless! - Entire apartment with fully equipped kitchen and private balcony! - With Wifi, Free parking, TV with Netflix and Air conditioning! - Access to the two patios and the magnificent Rooftop terrace ! - Brand new coffee shop & laudromat in our building ! - We also hold the legal permit for tourism and hotels in Montreal (CITQ).

My fantastic condo is in the absolute best spot downtown Montreal, you can walk to the old port, Bell center, the Contemporary Art Museum and you are in the same block as the top bars and nightclubs. you can find all kind of local and international restaurants from fast food to fancy steaks in a 10-minute walk radius! A 17-floor balcony with an amazing view lets you watch directly the nightlife of Montreal and enjoy all the downtown view. The building is also seconds away from metro/subway.

This room is in a cozy bungalow only 30 minutes from Montreal city where you can visit this beautiful city day and night Enjoy cosmopolitan Montreal and stay in a very quit neighbourhood.   Very comfortable king size bed and bathroom. Enjoy also cross country ski, tennis, swimming in a pool near the river and nature trails. If you dont have a car the 205 takes you to Roxboro train station or Fairview for train or metro to downtown.

Cette chambre est située dans un logement strictement privée et est réservée strictement a une invite de sexe féminin. Le bâtiment dans lequel se trouve la chambre est a 3 minutes d'une station de métro pour se rentre au centre ville de Motreal.

A modern blend of white color accents makes this apartment a serene place that beckons for your arrival. This loft-style condo is perfectly suited for dining and entertaining. Pets allowed (less than 25 pounds) with a fee. **Art work or painting on the wall upon availability. Lofts have the same style and decor.

This well located apartment is the best of both worlds; easy access to city life, restos, transport and night life nestled in the quiet charm of an urban neighbourhood. The one bedroom has a outdoor patio and the living room has a queen size pull out.

Whether you are in town for business or pleasure,  you'll enjoy the comfort of this fully equipped newly built luxury condo with unmatched amenities not available elsewhere: exclusive access to the gym, sauna, jacuzzi, pool, sun terrace, and more. There is plenty of free street parking in the area and indoor parking is also available - contact us for details!

The apartment is completely renovated in the modern condo style. Open concept for the kitchen with dining area that overlooks the living room. The closed bedroom has its own private balcony. Lots of storage throughout the apartment (wardrobes and closets). You will find a large bathtub in the bright bathroom. Parking is available behind, and you will be a few minutes walk from the subway. There are many shops, cafes and restaurants at the end of the street.

Cozy, 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of downtown Montréal. Newly renovated flat, with spotlights and option of dimmed lighting. Open kitchen concept, big bedroom one with walk-in closet. Washer and dryer included in the apartment. Perfect for a couple. No cable TV, HDMI cable provided though.

Very spacious and comfortable room, where you will sleep deeply and wake up energized to continue with your journey.  Chambre très spacieuse et confortable, où vous dormirez profondément et vous réveillerez avec énergie pour continuer votre aventure.

500sqft 2 bedroom apartment.  2nd floor ( high stairs to walk) -Next to beri uqam metro. /subway -Steps away: the gay village,cartier des spectancles, st-denis street, latin quarter,retautants, supermarket , after hour clubs. -3 min drive to old port. -bixxie bikes available right outside in the summer Sleeps 4 in bedrooms. SEE FLOOR PLAN -2 queen beds +1 child on couch -Parking in back alley

Very spacious 2 bedroom apartment with a great view of downtown Montreal.  This is the perfect location to visit Montreal! You’ll be right next to Mount-Royal. The bus will take you to the famous Ste Catherine street in just 10min.  You can park your car for free all day while you go tour around the city*

The apartment is located a few steps away from the metro Jarry. Multiple restaurants, pubs, coffee shops and stores are near. This is one of the most welcoming neighborhoods in Montreal. The bedroom has its own bathroom.  While there is parking available on the street, please be aware of the parking signs.  Though there's a bar downstairs, it only gets noisy Friday and Saturday nights.  *To let us well prepare the rooms, please respect our check-in/check-out schedules *

SismiK Bed'n Fun est un lieu de partage autant que de respect. Vous êtes libre d'aller et venir, relaxer ou discuter, utiliser les lieux communs comme vous le voulez. Système de son bose, écran TV 40 pouces, cuisine totalement équipée. 1 seule chambre en location. Les parties communes sont le salon, la cuisine et la salle de bain.  On est a 100 metres du métro Joliette. en 10 minutes au centre ville... autobus devant la porte... et le charme des promenades Ontario...
It’s located in a quiet neighborhood. 15 minutes from the airport and 20 Minutes to get downtown by car or bus. Also close to the Lachine canal and bicycle path. This apartment is a Semi sous-sol

Nice and big apartment at walking distance from the metro (Snowdon station on the orange and blue line), 20 minutes from downtown and the old port. Minutes away from grocery store, drug stores and St-Joseph Oratory. Free parking on the street nearby. The room is very big and clean. Freshly renovated washroom and kitchen. Washer and dryer accessible in apartment the kitchen, no extra cost.

Welcome to my artsy little loft located in ndg/westmount area. One of Montreal’s most beautiful boroughs. My place is located in a safe building with security cameras, directly infront of vendome metro, a block away from Sherbrooke street which has everything you need from grocery stores, to bars, to restaurants, parks and everything else.  My place is a two story loft, living room/kitchen/bathroom on the first floor, and bedroom is upstairs. It also includes a large private terrace!

Freshly renovated, bright and roomy 4-bedroom apartment in a classical stand-alone Montreal duplex. Conveniently located: 3 minute walk to Snowdon metro station, grocery stores and a myriad of small shops, cafes and restaurants on Queen Mary street. Perfect for a family or a group of friends that is looking to have a comfortable getaway in Montreal!

Chaleureux appartement situé au 2e étage d'un duplex à Rosemont Petite-Patrie.  Situé à 15 min. de 3 lignes de métro (verte, orange et bleue). Idéal pour les familles! Équipement pour bébé (chaise haute, lit voyageur, etc.) disponible sur demande. Lovely apartment located on the 2nd floor of a duplex in Rosemont Petite-Patrie. Located at 15 min. from 3 subway lines (green, orange and blue). Ideal for families! Baby equipment (high chair, traveler's bed, etc.) available on request.

The room is located at the 4th floor and comes with a breathtaking view over the city. Stay in the absolute centre of one of the finest neighbourhood of Montreal. The loft is located right next to Mont Royal station with metros to all over Montréal. Plenty of bars, restaurants, cafés and cute shops outside the front door.

This condo is perfect for a small family or couple. It has a king and double beds as well as a comfortable sofa.  Just minutes away from downtown by public transportation or car. The kitchen is fully equiped and washer/dryer are at your disposal.

Lumineux, agréable, dernier étage, à côté de la Plaza Saint-Hubert, à 2 pas du Plateau, du marché Jean-Talon et du Mile-End. Métro Rosemont tout près (1 minute de marche). 1 chambre fermée + 1 canapé-lit. Lave-linge, bureau, wi-fi, téléphone, ventilateur au plafond de la chambre et ventilateur sur pied. Stores supplémentaires disponibles pour pièce avec canapé-lit. Le chat n'est pas inclus, et mes affaires personnelles seront, bien entendu, retirées. 2 balcons (table et chaises pour y manger).

Situé au coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal sur la célèbre rue St-Denis, cette suite luxueuse (petite appartement) à été entièrement aménagée avec des matériaux et ameublement de qualités supérieures. Vous serez enchanté par la luminosité abondante qu'offre cet emplacement chaleureux et accueillant. Ce qui distingue et rend cet immeuble unique est sa superbe terrasse située sur la rue Saint-Denis. Vous n'aurez qu'à apporter votre vin et fromage pour profiter et vivre des moments inoubliables!
Très bel appartement très ensoleillé, style vintage, meublé avec beaucoup de gout. Très belle vue, calme et apaisant.  Peut prendre jusqu'à 4 voyageurs. Situé proche des parcs en face du Mont-Royal.

Sun filled, clean and newly renovated  comfy studio in the heart of Mile-Ex, next to great food at Jean-Talon Market, close to orange and blue metro lines (10min walk to Jean-Talon, 3min to Castelneau). Perfect for couples, small family or business travelers in a lovely part of town.

Cozy, chic home, beautiful lighting, and very welcoming. Shared with 3 lovely and talented ladies, 4 bedrooms, 2 balconies, skylight, 1 bathroom with a big tub and shower. It's located in the hottest area in Montreal, extremely lively at all times. Close to downtown restaurants, bars, clubs, grocery stores, parks, banks, library, gym, and the mountain in Plateau Mont Royal where all the action happens. You will never find yourself bored in this friendly and outgoing neighbourhood.

Executive apartment decorated by an interior designer, located near the Main (restaurants, bars, etc.) in the Quartier des spectacles (the largest concentration of festivals in the world.) In the heart of the action, this 1860 invariably contrasts with its tranquility, warmth and comfort.

Bel appartement spacieux, comportant 3 chambres fermées, complètement équipé, et avec un jardin donnant sur une belle ruelle verte.  Il est situé dans le quartier central, familial et branché de Rosemont-Petite Patrie, et accessible par le métro (5 min à pied). Attention : nous avons un chat avec lequel cohabiter :-)

Located in the heart of Downtown Montreal, this penthouse offers a spectacular view from a large balcony! It's surrounded by amenities such as the Guy metro station, a 24/7 dep, and many food spots all less than a minute walk away.  Pets are allowed so feel free to bring your fuzzy friends along!

We are located 150m away from Sherbrooke metro station, close to Le village, Le plateau, Lafontaine Park and downtown. You must appreciate the appartment for the location, the roommates :) and the mood. It's perfect for couples, single travelers or even workers.

Condo a Deux chambres, une salle de bain. Cuisine très bien équipée pour cuisiner. Salon avec très grand divan sectionnel et lit d'appoint pouvant accueillir 2 voyageurs chaque. Situé derriere la rue St-Catherine en plein cœur du centre-ville.  ——————- Condo with 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Equipped kitchen. Big couch and extra bed that can accommodate 2 travelers each. Behind St-Catherine street in the heart of downtown. 1st time on airbnb ? Use link & receive 45$ off : https://abnb.me/e/UUcByB8kaV

Vous voulez être près du Centre-Ville, du Vieux-Port et du Canal Lachine? Vous voulez faire des achats sur la fameuse rue Ste-Catherine, visiter les musés, marcher sur les pavés de briques du Vieux-Montreal ou tout simplement marcher sur le bord du réputé canal  ruisselant de beauté et de poisson ? Bienvenue chez moi ! ;D

Situé dans le Village, le quartier gai de Montréal, le condo est situé au centre de la ville. Il vous accueille dans une ambiance chaleureuse avec un intérieur neuf et des électroménagers haut de gamme. Un bain vous permet de vous reposer après une journée de découvertes! À quelques minutes à pied de la principale station de métro de Montréal (Berri-UQAM), près des principales attractions et des services, il offre un walking score de 99/100! Il répondra aux attentes des voyageurs urbains!

Perfectly located, and fully loaded semi-basement suite located minutes from Berri-Uqam or Sherbrooke metro, the plateau, latin quarter, LaFontaine park, and the gay village, this cozy abode is perfect for small families or a couple visiting. Built for two, this small flat easily accommodates three or more.  You'll have the place to yourself for the duration of the stay with flexible check-in and check-out.
Le métro au coin de la rue, SdB et cuisine rénovées, plancher de bois franc neuf, 1 chambre avec un walk-in, surface (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) env.) Contactez-moi :)

- Tastefully Furnished.. - Best Location , Hearth of Down town Montreal - Side by Side Concordia University - Walking distance to Metro Guy-Concordia. - Multinational restaurants, cafe and bars 5 min to crescent st.

Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel. - 24/7 support via text, email, or phone - Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided - Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive - Self check-in

The lodgement is well located. Just 2 minutes walk to metro Jean-Talon , 20 minutes by metro to downtown Montreal, restaurants, coffee shops and bakery, fruit and vegetables market just few steps away

- Tastefully Furnished. - Luxury , Modern and Authentic . - Best Location , Hearth of Down town Montreal. - Walking distance to Metro Guy. - Myriads of multinational restaurants, cafe and bars, 5 min walk to crescent and st Catherine street.

Logement avec mur de briques et plafonds hauts. Parfait pour se sentir chez-vous et profiter des attraits et de la nature de Montréal.  4 places pour dormir. BRAND NEW ADDITION TO OUR PORTFOLIO-THIS NEWLY FURNISHED AMAZING APARTMENT IS NOW READY TO WELCOME YOU! Top Location! Location! Location!  This has it all! We are offering a clean, warm, comfortable and stylish furnished apartment. Two bedrooms , spacious living room, nice equipped kitchen and small but friendly use bathroom. Fully furnished and completely equipped, this apartment shines with luxury from the gorgeous dark hardwood flooring throughout, to all the wonderful details that make this apartment so unique. Experienced host since 2015 with over 200 reviews. This is our new Freshly painted and newly furnished 2 bedroom apartment with parking in the neighbourhood of Lasalle in Montreal. Charmante maison familiale  d'aspect "chalet en ville"  avec immense jardin aménagé en terrasse avec BBQ, espaces de détente et aires de jeux située près des commerces du chemin de la Côte-Des-Neiges et de plusieurs parcs et piscines. Cozy, well-appointed, 1-bedroom condo (FULLY renovated 2016) on quiet street in trendy neighborhood.  Minutes to metro and bus. All new quality bedding and kitchen, antique furniture, spanking new bathrooms and kitchen. Squeaky clean. Park, cafés, restaurants. Wonderful location

If you are looking to be in one of the most central locations in Montreal where all the new and trendy restaurants and bars and stores meet the typical and most historical eateries and bagel shops, then look no further.  This is your place!

Stay at our large and bright two bedrooms home away from home. The suite offers bright contemporary living spaces and an outstanding blend of function, comfort and style. You will have the truly relaxing feeling of home.

Très bel appartement entièrement rénové. Situé tout près d'un métro, du plus grand marché (Jean Talon) de Montréal, d'un supermarché, d'un grand parc avec piscine. Tout cela dans un des meilleur quartier de la ville.
Modern and carefully decorated apartment with balcony, in the eclectic city of Montreal, for 3 people. Ideal for couples, families, groups of friends and business travelers.

Stylish spacious condo at heart of DT, close to enormous arts activities, 1 minute by foot from the convention center of Montreal, complexe Desjardins, never bored.  * Two steps from the metro Place d'armes, place des arts, old port. * 2 big bedrooms and spacious living room. * With Balcony * Super clean and furnished with quality and with modern taste. * 35 Mo highly speed wifi  * New LG powerful air conditioner * New renovation * Three new Queen beds * 2 places sofa bed, 1 Queen air mattress,

Located in a historic Canadian house, this apartment offers a queen size bed, a work space, a lounge area and the ideal courtyard for BBQ picnics. My place is a lovely, light filled and quiet retreat in the middle of all of the action. It is a breezy and peaceful space in walking distance to everything you might want to see and do in Montreal. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, or families, and their furry friends.
Welcome to my home! My beautiful Montreal condo has lots of natural light and is stocked with everything you'll need for a comfortable stay at my place.

L'appartement est refait à neuf. Il y a deux grandes terrasses avec BBQ, un balcon et tout est équipé. La chambre est grande avec lit, armoires, bureau et penderie.L'apparement est situé au croisement beaubien/st denis - proche épiceries...
Private room in a nice and clean apartment shared with two lovely roommates.

Typical Montreal apartment with outside/inside stairs, with exposed brick walls. Can accommodate 2 people/2BR. A 5 minute walk away from Beaubien Metro station, on a street which is lively in the daytime and safe at night. A perfect place close to all the amenities for a truly relaxing break!
Take the orange line metro, get off at mont-royal, and walk 10 minutes to get there!

Centrally located in Le Plateau and close to all the hip districts, visiting Montreal is made easy when staying in this beautiful loft. Stunning open concept loft, newly refurbished, with all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay. My apartment is very clean, comfy, my neighbours are friendly and quiet. The location is ideal for daytime explorers who want a nice calm place to relax in the evening. It's close to all services and only 30 minutes from downtown Montreal!  I don't have any pet and I don't smoke, but you can.

Beau grand rez de chaussé sur une rue tranquille tout rénové et moderne. Le logement comprend 2 chambres à coucher doubles et chaque pièce commune est très grande. L'appartement est très bien situé dans la petite italie à deux pas de tous les restaurants et services nécessaires. Ma coloc est partie, je sous-loue sa chambre pour le mois de juin. L'appart comprend 2 chambres (dont une pour moi), 1 salle de bain, 1 grande pièce faisant cuisine+salon, et 2 balcons. L'appart est proche de tout, dans un  quartier qui bouge!

Downtown location in MTL that is close to pretty much all fun activities! Close to metro and bus lines that can take you to all spots in the city. This apartment has 3 private bedrooms with double beds which sleeps up to 6 guests. In the living room, a mattress and a couch can sleep up to 2 extra guests. Welcome to your home away from home! We're here to make your stay in Montreal comfortable and hassle-free, with lockbox check-ins but a host will always be available on call. Grand 3 et demi à louer AVEC STATIONNEMENT et court arrière dans le magnifique arrondissement de Verdun. Studio très propre distance de marche métro St-Henri. Tranquille près de parcs. Proximité marché Atwater, canal Lachine, centre-ville, autoroute 20 et 15.

A cozy, modern and clean Condo with plenty of natural light and conveniently located. Groceries, pharmacy, bus stop and coffee within minutes walk. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples et les voyageurs en solo. Bel appartement situé au cœur du plateau - mile end. En face du métro et de toutes les commodités (pharmacie, épiceries, café, place à brunch et dépanneur 24/24 Parc laurier 500m) un roof top incroyable!!!

Close to the water, metros, and the many beautiful Verdun parks.  We invite you to enjoy this entire 2 floor home and make it your own. Huge kitchen for entertaining, master bedroom, a clean pull-out and brand new double bed in our daughter's room, space for all to relax & play!

Suitable for all.  Ideal for travelers who appreciate peace, comfort and welcoming surroundings at an affordable price. No children. A unique retreat in a  prized neighborhood. [Parking available (15$/night)]  Contemporary Condo in The Heart of Downtown at the crossroads of mountain serenity and fast-paced city life. Calm and sunny room to rent in condo in Mile-End. Entirely furnished (DBL bed, desk, bookshelf, closet.) Close to UdeM and McGill, walking distance to public transportation, shopping, parks, cafés, pharmacies. Must like kids and cats.

Homey Bed & Breakfast located east of downtown Montreal. We have 26 private rooms with a mix of rooms with 1 double bed, 2 double beds and 1 queen bed.  Rooms with 1 double bed have a shower. BRAND NEW ADDITION TO OUR PORTFOLIO-THIS NEWLY FURNISHED AMAZING APARTMENT IS NOW READY TO WELCOME YOU! This has it all! Two bedrooms plus mezzanine, sun-filled apartment, located in the heart of the ultra cool Plateau Mont-Royal, on a pedestrian street near the best restaurants, tourist attractions, bars and shops. Fabulous REMODELED Loft Style apartment in the heart of Montreal.  Quiet community of Montreal, minutes from the Viau Subway Metro station, one block from the bus station, close to Olympic stadium, Botanical gardens etc. . Fully updated without losing it's charm of the early 1900 with charming 9 foot ceiling high & custom crown molding.  All new furniture inside as of 2017.  One closed off bedroom, a Murphy bed in the formal dining room and large sofa-bed that gives flexibility to entertain.

Appartement abordable dans l'est du Plateau Mont-Royal : deux chambres fermées avec lit double, cuisine, salon, deux balcons! Un quartier vibrant à proximité de tout: plusieurs parcs, bus, épiceries, cafés!

Private master bedroom in a beautiful spacious sunny apartment located on a busy strip of famous Monkland village neighborhood.  The apartment is on the top floor and sound proof, so it is very quite.    There is a pole/exercise room, weights, yoga mat, etc in the apartment.

Bright renovated 2nd floor corner apartment 10 minutes from downtown Montreal! This 1000 square foot very luminous condo has one bedroom with a queen size bed, a kitchen, dinner room, living room all open space, a big bathroom, a mezzanine with a bar, a fireplace and a large terrasse. It has a cathedral ceiling aswell !

Big apartment situated  at 2 minutes walk from Metro and 15mins drive from downtown. Live neighborhood with lots of bars, coffee shops, restaurants and glossaries nearby. Mon logement est proche du Métro Lionel-Groulx, du Marché Atwater, du Canal Lachine, du Pub Burgundy Lion, de Joe Beef, de Liverpool House, du Théâtre Corona, du Vin Papillon, etc. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour la luminosité, les bons matelas, la grande cuisine, le confort et la hauteur des plafonds. Chambre à louer dans notre appartement. La cuisine (toute équipée) et la salle de bain sont partagées. Nous avons également un billard au sous sol que vous pourrez utiliser. La rue Wellington est à 5 min avec tous les commerces de proximité.

* events charge extra. For 62 dollars free sign up to Airbnb with this link ! https://abnb.me/e/VCfsGDx0kZy. The apartment is located on Saint Laurent street. Bright and cozy fully-furnished room with individual temperature control and a floor air-conditioner in a typical Plateau townhouse only steps from Mont-Royal Metro, French bakeries, cafés, pubs and restaurants, with view onto a quiet garden. Croissant (or other) breakfast included on first day.

Mon logement est proche de Métro Sherbrooke, Métro Beaudry, Poutineville, Marché St-Jacques, Parc Lafontaine. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour la cuisine, la hauteur des plafonds, l'ambiance chaleureuse, la proximité du centre. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples et les voyageurs en solo.

Over 1,000 perfect 5-star reviews across all of our properties. Originally built as a hotel in the 1820s, this loft remains in Montreal's absolute best location. The apartment is completely renovated in the modern condo style. Open concept for the kitchen with dining area that overlooks the living room. The closed bedroom has its own private balcony. Authentic 1917 apartment located in Hochelaga-Maisonneuve (HoMa). It’s comfortably furnished and well equipped for you to enjoy your stay in Montreal during winter or summer! Also, a private parking spot is provided.

Beautiful, sunny home in the heart of le Plateau. Nice causey double room in Villeray next to pretty much every possible commodity with relaxed and welcoming guests ! Enjoy the vibrant district of Prince-Arthur and live in this brand new bachelor suite. From this great location, you can just walk to Downtown and the Universities. A little tiny studio but really organized and confortable near from the center of Montréal, in a really nice neighbourhood! And just 10 minutes walking from the famous Mont-Royal park!

Bright and sunny two-bedroom apartment located in beautiful Outremont neighbourhood, close to hip restaurants, cafes, bars, parks, and more. Your private room is located in a spacious first floor apartment in the best location on the Plateau. Apartment is Smoke free and Pet free. Hello! I have a large apartment in the heart of Little Italy for rent. It is located on St Laurent Boulevard, surrounded by shops, cafes and restaurants,. A charming, bright space with all the amenities. Located in the heart of Montreal's lively Plateau. Newly renovated 2-bedroom apartment. A great place to relax and recharge from your busy day of exploring the city.

This is a furnished 2 bedroom apt. located in a family friendly and multi cultural neighborhood near  subway station, banks, stores, restaurants, parks, coffee shops ,St. Joseph Oratory, etc. It can comfortably fits 5-6 guests. This apartment is perfection. . It's located just east of the campus of world-renown McGill University, and south of the mountain for which the city is named. One bedroom apartment located 2 min from downtown, the building is only a few minutes walk from the shops and restaurants of St—Denis & Saint-Laurent streets. Cozy turn-key 1 bedroom with a sofa bed in living room in the village. Fully renovated condo possible located in a quiet area of downtown on 2 floor of a historial 1800s building. Unique in the neighborhood, a huge new apartment in the former presbytery of the nearby church. (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sq/ft) . 2nd floor of a triplex. Large private back terrace. We (Marie and Éliane) live in a loft in an old industrial building on the Plateau. Industrial means that we have 2 full walls of thin windows and the rest is brick walls. Charming bright and large room for rent (for women only) in a 2 bedroom apartment on Plateau Mont-Royal, the trendiest part of Montreal. Décor artistique et chaleureux. Vous partagerez l'appartement avec Gaëlle et moi même. Nous avons un petit chat très sociable dénommé Loon. Tout le confort à 8min à pieds du Métro Joliette (ligne verte) Un arrêt de bus se trouve également juste à la porte de l'appartement #29, qui parcourt une grande partie du centre ville. À 2 min de la promenade Ontario ou se trouvent tous les magasins dont vous aurez besoin.

Logement chaleureux à proximité de la station de métro Jarry et de toutes les commodités (pharmacies, épiceries et SAQ). À dix minutes à pied du grand parc Jarry et du stade Uniprix. Près de l'autoroute 40 et de plusieurs artères principales de la ville desservies par autobus. Cuisine complète.

Magnifique 5 1/2 situé dans le secteur Centre-Sud, à l'intersection du Plateau Mont-Royal, le Village, le quartier Homa ainsi que le Vieux-Montréal. Bonjour!  Bienvenue à notre appartement chaleureux. Chez nous vous ferrez comme chez vous avec accès aux espaces commun, aux appareils, à la cuisine etc. Parfaitement situé en ville à 2 minutes du Métro Montroyal et des bars, boutiques, et restos!

Beautifully designed 2 bedroom house in a great neighborhood, each with an en-suite bathroom (1 King bed and 1 Queen bed). Big, open space apartment in the heart of Plateau-Mont-Royal with 2 bedrooms for 2 (+ couch for 5th person). A few steps away from the mountain and many restaurants, bars, cafés, shops, galleries... Near Mont-Royal subway station and many 24hr buses.

Spacious 1 bedroom with a minimalist artsy decor, includes living room + modern kitchen + bath and a bedroom with a balcony having an incredible view of downtown. Beautiful condo, 2 bedrooms, parking,kitchen & bathroom recently renovated (2011), confy, all furnished, sunny, located on the 3rd floor of a triplex, in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, close by stores, restaurant , parcs, bars and dnt Montreal.

Superbe appartement situé dans le Vieux Rosemont à 1min des promenades Masson. Le métro Laurier, Joliette et St-Michel se trouve à 10minutes d'autobus. Épiceries , SAQ , bars et petits marchés locaux a distance a pied.

Plateau Mont-Royal à 2 pas du métro Laurier et Rosemont. Située sur le Plateau Mont-Royal à la jonction des quartiers Rosemont et du Mile-End. Situé dans le secteur sud-ouest de Montréal, à 7 minutes de marche du métro Jolicoeur et quelques minutes des circuits autobus. Logement indépendant dans un triplex. Propriétaire occupant au rez-de-chaussée. Non-fumeur.

Mon logement est proche de la vie nocturne, les transports en commun, le centre ville, les activités adaptées aux familles. Appartement au dernier étage d'un quartier dynamique parfait pour une personne seule ou un couple qui souhaiterait trouver un petit nid douillet pour quelques jours à Montréal. Appartement d'époque rénové par un menuisier écologiste.  Cet appartement lumineux de 1150 pi (115m) est tout équipé et adapté aux tout petits. Studio fraîchement rénové ,  entièrement meublé et situé dans le quartier Rosemont Petite-Patrie à 2 minutes du Métro Iberville . This beautifully renovated and fully furnished 2-bedroom luxury condo in the heart of Montreal’s trendy Plateau neighbourhood will take your breath away.  We offer a list of amenities including a very bright and comfortable living room with a cozy couch, a backyard patio with a garden and barbecue, heated kitchen floor, huge bathtub and walk-in shower, and a brick-wall Master Bedroom with French doors.  It is the perfect urban oasis in the summer and a great escape in the Montreal winter!

Brand new condo, nicely decorated with rooftop terrace, on a quiet street. 5 minutes walk from Papineau metro station and Jacques Cartier Bridge. Bright and comfortable 1 bedroom apartment in the centre of the trendy Plateau neighbourhood. Bakeries, pubs, and amazing French restaurants are just around the corner and the Mont Royal metro station is less than a 5 minute walk away once you're ready to see the rest of the city.
Clean, bright, very nice room in a quiet building. Easily accessible after a day of sightseeing. Very close to metro lines, restaurants and services.

Very hip apparement in Montreal’s trendiest neighbourhood. 5 mins walk to Metro station. Rooms are very spacious. It’s on the top floor, very quite and very sunny all day long. Quiet area close to highway and all services. Endless bars and restaurant to try.

My bright & perfectly located 2BR condo is close to everything in downtown: place des arts, Bell Center, shopping malls, restaurants bars .... This appt can fit 7 peoples comfortably. Located in the beautiful area of Plateau-Mont-Royal and also close to downtown (5min walk to the metro), this cozy 3 bedroom apartment is the perfect place to accommodate you and your family/friends during your stay in Montreal.

Appartement de 4 chambres proche du Parc Lafontaine, de la rue St-Denis et de tous les services. Vous l'apprécierez pour le quartier et la luminosité. Que ce soit pour profiter des festivals, d'un week-end à la découverte de MTL, d'une semaine de repos, visiter de la famille, mon logement est parfait pour les voyageurs en solo, les couples et les voyageurs d'affaires. well located at the center of downtown Montreal, walking distance to everywhere.  There is nothing shared with someone else. 24 hours Security monitor system.  A great deal for travelers

My place is in the center of Montreal, you have amazing restaurants, grocery stores and it is one block from the Berri-UQAM metro! An home away from home !  Welcome to this unique apartment built in 1870! In it, you can enjoy the comfort of home while being walking distance from the bustling city of Montreal. Chambre disponible dans un appartement situé dans le quartier branché de Rosemont sur une rue calme et résidentielle. Room available in an apartment located in the trendy neighborhood of Rosemont on a quiet residential street.

Enjoy the charm of a neighborhood with lots of shops in a quiet apartment, close to everything just 430 yards from the Beaubien Metro station. You will feel immediately at home, with everything from Wi-Fi to a coffee machine, and can relax in the courtyard after a long day.

Brand New and Renovated split level Basement In-law suite, part of the main house with independent entrance by the garage door, in ideal location. My place offers high ceilings throughout, a large double closed bedroom/office, private patio w bbq, living room w a big cozy couch to unwind after a big day. Grocery store/bixi located across the street, 5 min walk from the wonderful park Lafontaine! I love this neighbourhood and I think you will too!

Confortable petit 3 1/2 dans Hochelaga, parfait pour personne voyageant seule ou couple. L'appartement est composé d'une pièce double (salon/bureau et chambre), d'une cuisine complète et d'une salle de bain toujours propre. Il y a également un balcon à l'arrière.

Super location, comfy apartment for 2, all equipped, simple, nice, convenient. Vintage, warm and cozy.  Size = 50m2. For a great stay in Montreal, in a nice neighborhood. On PLAZA St-Hubert, near Mile End, Mile Ex, Plateau and Outremont. 300 m from Rosemont subway station.

Superbe Appartement 4  1/2 calme et bien décoré, chaleureux et cosy, agréable dans un quartier tranquille mais proche de tout (supermarché, Canadian tire, Poste, Parc...) à 15 min à pied du centre ville de Montréal.

Joli loft de 35 m2 tout équipé situé en plein coeur de la promenade Fleury. Il s'agit du semi sous-sol d'un duplex très éclairé avec porte d'entrée patio indépendante. Nice loft of 35 m2 very equipped located in full heart of the promenade Fleury.
Magnifique condo entièrement équipé et climatisé pouvant accueillir 2 personnes. Situé sur une rue résidentielle mais centrale ... à 10 minutes du centre-ville et du Vieux Montréal !

Nice and cosy appartment, 2 balconies, 2 big bedrooms with recent double size beds, close to the Olympic Stadium, Biodome, Planetarium and Botanical Garden and 20 min from downtown by metro. A stylish place to stay in a typical neighbourhood.

Chambre queen dans un appartement calme partagé, en hyper centre de Montréal (avec une Québécoise et un Français, professionnels et calmes).  Accès à un balcon direct sur la chambre.  3mn, précisément, à pied du métro 10mn à pied de : - UQAM - Mont Royal - Place d’Armes

Our spacious apartment is newly refurbished and family friendly. Situé proche du parc nature de l’île-de-la-visitation, très apprécié par les familles et les touristes. Environnement sain et agréable. Un Provigo est juste à côté pour l'épicerie. Charmant appartement, 2 chambres, idéal pour une famille.  Proche de tous les services et à seulement 8 minutes de marche du métro qui se rend au centre ville en 10 minutes. Près du métro sur le Plateau Mont-Royal, avec un jardin tranquille donnant sur la ruelle. Montréal typique. Le tarif proposé privilégie la location à la semaine

Beautifull and luxury fully furnished one bedroom in Old Montreal.  Best location in Montreal. Ideally located in the heart of Montreal bordering the historic old port and downtown.  In front of Palais des congres and next to Place d'Armes metro.

Historic Boutique Hotel in Old Montreal Originally home to the Hotel Richelieu, Maison Saint-Vincent is a Montreal landmark.  With a preserved exterior dating back to 1858, the allure of MSV is undeniable. Completely renovated, while maintaining the original charm, Maison Saint-Vincent is designed for independent traveler, professionals, and foodies.

Puisqu'une image vaut mille mots, nos images peuvent a elles seules témoigner le cadre enchanteur et pittoresque constituant l'environnement de notre local. Notre objectif premier était de charmer a la fois les citadins et les banlieusards., et le pari est enfin gagné. La symbiose entre une vie  urbaine et une vie de banlieue est finalement possible mais... chez nous. Le parc de la Visitation est a deux pas de notre coin. Située au bord de la rivière, notre maison assiste a un éternel spectacle.

Elegant, entirely renovated 1-bedroom basement apartment with fully-equiped kitchen. 1 double bed in the room and 1 sofa bed in the living room. TV with Fire tv and WiFi access included. 2 minutes walk from bus stop to Downtown Montreal and airport. Élégant appartement 3 1/2 entièrement rénové au sous-sol d’un triplex. Cuisine tout équipée. Divan-lit au salon. Télévision avec Fire tv et WiFi inclus.  À  2 pas des transports en commun pour aller au centre-ville de Montréal et à l’aéroport.

This apartment is 1 min away from the metro station Mont-Royal and surrounded by plenty of shops, restaurants, parcs to hang out!  It's just the best place to live in if you want to be a real Montreal-insider. You will simply love it!

A 3 bedroom apartment on the 1st floor.  Well situated in Le Plateau west, near restaurants and bars yet a residential street.  10 min walk to subway (Metro),  A few blocks from downtown, Quartier des Spectacles and famous Mile-end (trendy).  Minutes from Le Mont-Royal, ideal for snowshoeing and cross-country skiing (winter). Beautiful walks and jogging (summer).   The Plateau is known for it's cafés, restaurants, bars, graffitis, energetic, and a laissez-faire attitude. Business or pleasure.

I'd be happy to show you around, tell you where things are, or go out with you. I live at the Airbnb, so I am mostly around to help out, and even when I am not home, I'm quick to respond to texts. Top floor of a white, tall ceilinged apartment filled with light. I work during the day , so I will most likely be away in the mornings so you will have the whole house to yourself. - Tastefully Furnished - Luxury , Modern and Authentic  - Best Location , Hearth of Down town Montreal - Side by Side Concordia University - Walking distance to Metro Guy. - Myriads of multinational restaurants, cafe and bars, 5 min walk to crescent and st Catherine street.

Spacious shared guest area  it's a shared room for MIXED GENDERS guests for women and men :) 5m walk to  metro Cote St.Catherin station 15m walk to metro Cote des Nieges station. Large, bright apartment, fully renovated in 2014, with a terrace located above the Pastaga restaurant, meal + night package on request. 1 bedroom with a queen size bed and 2 sofa beds. Public transport within one-minute walking distance, grocery store, dairy bar at a street corner.

Enjoy a unique Montreal experience and feel like a local in a brand new luxurious apartment 600PC fully renovated this year. Complement your stay in Montreal in a luxury apartment in the Old Port of Montreal. It is situated right next to the metro station Places d'Armes. Wonderfully located apartment in the heart of St Henri. Spacious 1 bedroom apartment that can host up to 3 guests. Amazing 4 1/2 apartment in Lasalle.  Fully renovated, on the 1st floor of a duplex. Located on a quiet residential street, near bike paths, tennis court, parks. Near bus stations that take you to the metro.

Private spacious bedroom in a 2-bedroom apartment, in a safe family neighborhood, big park right across the building! -Very central, only a 5min walk to 2 metro stations & close to all amenities (grocery, bank, post office, pharmacy, etc) -Only a 20min metro ride to/from downtown Montreal -From the apartment you can walk to some very popular Montreal attractions: hike to Mount Mont-Royal, walk to Lac-aux-castors, get a high top view of the city from Belvedere or visit Saint-Joseph's Oratory
Welcome to my own little place. I’m working a lot and my daughter moved out so I decide to open my house to you guys

My place is close to restaurants and dining and art and culture. You’ll love my place because of the location and the neighbourhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

Monthly rentals only! We are located in Little Italy area, 1 minute walk from Beaubien subway!  Dozens of Italians restaurants. The area is very nice and safe, very lively. a minute away from shopping area, 5 from the famous jean-talon market.

My place is close to the city centre (about 20 minutes ), public transport (walking 5 minutes), parks (walking 3 minutes), the airport (about 25 minutes ).  Very close to mall with many stores and restaurants.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).
A nice, sunny, charming apartment in the heart of one of the most sought after, authentic and diverse Montreal neighbourhood.

Profitez de cet appartement sophistiqué à l’emplacement idéal pour savourer votre séjour dans la ville de Montreal. Le festival de Jazz et le quatier chinois sont situer a quelque minute a pied. Mon logement est proche de plusieurs restaurants et commerces ainsi que  deux métros à moins de 500m, des épiceries, le marché Atwater, le Canal Lachine et bientôt la plage de Verdun. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour sa spatialité, sa luminosité, l'immense cuisine toute équipée, le toit terrasse et le confort. Parfait pour des gens d'affaires de passage, des sportifs en recherche de pied à terre pour une competition dans la regions, des couples ou des familles. Location pour party interdite.

This charming 1 bedroom cozy apartment is complete with  hardwood floors, a combined dining / living space and a generously sized kitchen & terrace. Located in the Plateau on Saint-Laurent along "The Main", the flat is central to a multitude of restaurants, bars, cafes, parks, boutiques, supermarkets and more. Great proximity to most of Montreal's major events & festivals. Simple, clean, comfortable and tasteful. A relaxing finish to a day out exploring Montreal, with staff to assist you 24/7.

Trendy apartment close to Downtown Montreal, the Plateau, the Metro, Mt. Royale, Boulevard St. Laurent (lots of restaurants, bars & boutiques), and much more! You’ll love my place because of the convenient location, beautiful high ceilings and wooden floors, private balcony, friendly people & our adorable cat! My place is great for couples and solo adventurers.

Located right in the Old Port of Montreal, just across the Congress Palace! Free safe and secure underground garage parking! High speed wifi internet available! Subway station is across the street! Plenty of restaurants, bars, coffee places, ice cream spots and much around the building walking distance! The unit has a beautiful city view towards the north direction!
A house in a quiet neighborhood. 15 minutes from the airport and 20 Minutes to get downtown by car or bus. Also close to the Lachine canal and bicycle path

The apartment has very high ceilings and large windows in the living room, bedroom, and bathroom so it gets plenty of natural light. The metro is only 3 min walking and there is parking nearby. All included Bright appartment. Large kitchen. 2 balcony, living room, dining room. Subway and buses at  the corner of the street will bring you downtown and all over Montreal.

Official Tourist Residence - CITQ member Résidence de tourisme officielle - membre de la CITQ We are located in Le Plateau, a central location on St-Denis street in Montreal. Ground floor fully renovated cozy apartment right in the heart of Montreal's most famous neighborhood - The Mile End. Make this classic 19th century stone building with lots of character your home! We're looking for a clean and responsible roommate to share this living space. Under 10 minutes walking distance to metro station De L'église, supermarkets, hospitals, restaurants. Minutes away from downtown.

(Minimum rental period of 30 days )  Two Bedroom apartment Beautifully furnished located in Griffintown in downtown Montreal,  10 min walk from Old Montréal Steps away from ÉTS - École de technologie supérieure Supermarket Adonis and Pharmacy right in front of the building.
In the heart of the action! New fully furnished condo on the Plateau Mont-Royal. Will house up to 6 guests in 2 bedrooms and living room sofa bed.  The place has air conditioning.

Magnifique 5 1/2 situé dans le secteur Centre-Sud, à l'intersection du Plateau Mont-Royal, le Village, le quartier Homa ainsi que le Vieux-Montréal. Grand et lumineux condo. Secteur prisé de Montréal. Boutiques, bars, terrasses et restos à distance de marche. Aire de vie spacieuse qui permet des vacances en famille confortable et à bas prix.

A 15 mn de l'aéroport.L'appartement ( +/- 800pc ou 75mc) - tout équipé et meublé-comprend un salon (canapet convertible)/chambre (lit double) avec espace bureau et une cuisine/salle a manger, une salle de bain avec douche et une entrée.

Modern studio apartment, perfect for a couple or a business trip near Downtown Montreal, Mount Royal Park and only a 5 min walk from the subway system. The apartment is located 15 minutes away from both Crescent St. and Saint-Laurent allowing to explore the nightlife and walk back home to rest on your cozy beds. Climb Mount-Royal if you want to see the view, visit the shopping spots a little down the street and foodies can get a taste of Montreal's world renown cuisine.

Perfect location, in the heart of plateau area, 5 minutes walking distance from Mont-Royal metro. Close to all bars, restaurants, groceries, 2 blocks away from park Lafontaine and from the best place for poutine,La Banquise!

Modern decor with an amazing view of Downtown Montreal. Private balcony. Centrally located minutes away from everything you will need. Metro's, restaurants, bars, clubs, shopping and much more. 2 smart t.v's with Youtube, Netflix capabilities and much more.  99 Walk Score.

Nice and comfy appartment, 2 bedrooms, sunny yard with parking in a calm neighborhood, near cafés, resto, subway, parks, river... 15 minutes away from downtown.  Bedroom with queen bed, one with single bed and a futon in the living room.

Located 200m from beautiful Jarry Park and Roger's Cup Tennis Stadium, 5 mins walk from a supermarket and metro stop, it's a short 5min metro ride to  Jean-Talon (Montreal's oldest Farmer's Market!) and just 25mins to downtown. There's free street parking for your vehicle too! Check-in after 17h30 on weekdays, but check-in time on weekends is very flexible (no specific time), and check-out any time of day convenient for you.  Sleep easy in a comfy queen bed, and enjoy the free breakfast!

Feel right at home in our brand new studio loft. This newly renovated space has everything you need for a couple's getaway or a business trip to Montreal. Located in the heart of the sought after Little Italy, surrounded by multiple artisanal cafés, renowned restaurants and chic bars. Check out our availability!
There are four rooms. You can spend time with friends and relatives. Walk to the subway station for about 4 minutes and to the city center for about 15 minutes

JOLIE CHAMBRE PRIVEE DANS CONDO NEUF ET MODERNE TRES CHALEUREUX ET ENSOLEILLEE... Grand appartement paisible situé dans le quartier Villeray à 5 minutes de marche du marché Jean-Talon et à 10 minutes de marche de la Petite Italie. Spacious and peaceful apartment located in the Villeray area, a 5-minute walk from the Jean Talon Market and a 10-minute walk from Little Italy.

Beautiful, newly renovated one-bedroom loft apartment located right on bustling and lively Saint Laurent Boulevard. Lots of windows give way to beautiful views of Mont Royal. A perfect place for three people to comfortably stay.

Over 1,500 perfect 5-star reviews across all of our properties. This apartment makes the impossible possible: a spacious and bright space right in the heart of downtown. Joli 3 1/2 aux allures de 4 1/2, dans le charmant quartier de Petite-Patrie. À moins de 10 minutes à pied du métro Beaubien. Confort, tranquillité, à proximité de chouettes commerces et cafés.
Hey guys! Get a great, clean, cozy room in the beautiful "Petite-Patrie". We live in a big furnished apt with all the facilities and we'll do our best to make your staying as pleasant as possible :)

Au coeur du quartier Mile-Ex, mon logement est proche à la fois de la Petite-Italie, du Marché Jean-Talon, de plusieurs épiceries, de pharmacies, d'une foule de restaurant et de bars et il est facilement accessible par métro ou par autobus. Vous apprécierez celui-ci le confort que vous y trouverez, la terrasse agréable et sa facilité d'accès au centre-ville par le transport en commun.  Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les aventuriers solitaires ou encore les voyageurs d'affaire.

Beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo for rent in Hampstead. Prime location  5 minutes from the Villa Maria metro station. Fully furnished. All brand new appliances, granite kitchen countertops, washer, dryer in unit. Master bedroom has an ensuite with a jacuzzi bathtub. Excellent opportunity for students (international, national, local) to enjoy a quality lifestyle in Montreal at a reasonable price.

High efficiency A/C, free access to the Gym, indoor convenience store, and business center. Impeccably clean and well maintained. Safe, secure, well-managed modern building. Concierge services (dry cleaning, housekeeping extras, taxi reservations, parcel delivery, etc.) All amenities included: Linens, toiletries, hair dryer, iron.

Chambre lumineuse entièrement meublée. À pied de tous les centres d'intérêt. Quartier tranquille et à proximité de tout: Métro, shoppings, parcs, musées, vieille ville, restaurants, nighlife et places des festivals.

Beautifully renovated condo with sleek and luxurious finishes, in the heart of Montreal's trendiest neighborhood. Best of both worlds! Nestled in a quiet Plateau street, but close to everything Montreal has to offer!  Walking distance from: -Restaurants, cafés, bakeries and bars  -Boulevard Saint-Laurent  -Rue Prince-Arthur (pedestrian street) -Saint-Luis Square  -Parc Lafontaine  -Parc Jeanne Mance -24h supermarket  Old Port easily accessible via Sherbrooke Metro Station
Newly renovated 1000sf 2rd floor apartment in a triplex originally built in 1912. Furnished with modern finishings close to all amenities. This apartment is your home away from home.

Spacious studio located downtown, right into the middle of the action, near Saint-Catherine street East and within walking distance to Saint-Laurent metro station. High-speed Wifi, no cable TV but smart TV (Netflix, youtube). Indoor parking spot included

Beautiful old fashioned apartment in the Mile-End next to all facilities and amenities. It is bright, spacious and cozy. The bedroom is beautifully designed with a lot of white and grey colours, decorated with happy plants.  Beautiful coffee shops and grocery stores less than 1 min walk away. 2 buses that take you to DT. 15min walk to Laurier metro station.

This apartment is very well located, closed to the old port and several subway stations and several bus stops. The apartment is sober. The bedroom faces a small parking lot. L'appartement est sobre. La chambre à coucher fait face à un petit parking. Les épiceries sont situés à environ dix minutes de marche.

You want to experience Montreal and you're looking for the ideal spot? Just rent 3759 Sewell, in  a small and quiet street but very close to mythical St-Lawrence boulevard (also called The Main) with its restaurants, bars, edgy shops and clubs. It's located between Entertainment  District, Plateau Mont-Royal and Ghetto McGill, three of Montreal's coolest neighbourhoods. Week-ends, whole weeks, everything is possible!
• Centrally located in the entertainment district. • Experience first-hand Montreal's unique culture, events and festivals. • Brand-new building is convenient to major subway and bus lines.

Clean, bright and spacious bedroom in the Mile-End/Plateau. The room has a double bed, a large closet, and a desk. (This rooms have a PRIVATE BALCONY). Situé à deux pas du Métro Rosemont, près de nombreux bars et restaurants, d'une bibliothèque, distance à pied du Mile-End, Plateau Mont-Royal, Marché Jean-Talon, Petite-Italie. Condo à aire ouverte style loft. Deux chambres, une salle de bain. Cuisine très bien équipée. Salon avec très grand divan en angle et lit d'appoint pouvant accueillir 2 voyageurs chaque. Situé en plein cœur du centre-ville, en bord de la rue Saint-Laurent.  Open concept condo. 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Equipped kitchen. Big couch and extra bed that can accommodate 2 travellers each. Behind the Main street in the heart of downtown.

Cette chambre est idéale pour un couple ou une personne seule. Situé au 2ème étage d'un immeuble construit dans les années 50 mais entièrement rénové en 2017. Very peaceful One bedroom confortable room in a quiet area near the river and park in the back  near bus 205

Don't miss Osheaga the famous music festival, from August 2nd to August 4th. Unique Duplex with 2 Bedrooms+ big Living area+Separated Dining space in the heart of the city right on ST-Denis Street for many locals the best neighborhood where you'll find all the best restaurants, bars, coffees, Movie-Theater.Don't look any further this location is just unbeatable within walking distance from all that MTL has to offer.

Your modern spacious apartment with private balconies awaits you! The apartment is located on the top floor of a triplex. Bright petite one bedroom apartment located in a small building above Cafe Vito. The building is a quiet refuge from the bustling nearby streets. Large comfortable and calm room in a huge apartment located near a quiet river. It’s like a chalet in the country… few minutes from downtown!  The neighbourhood is green and safe.
Appartement complet dans un quartier convivial et chaleureux à proximité de tous les services et transports en commun. Stationnement facile sur la rue.

A very bright clean bedroom. Suitable for a students or a couple to sleep in Queen size bed. Layout is modern and calm With a desk as working space. Bedroom has a closet and lots of lighting. We offer coffee and toast in morning only.  Guest must be pet friendly with one high energy dog.

Beautiful flat in an older (1928) duplex in the heart of popular Monkland Village area. 1300 sq feet; two bedrooms (one master, one child’s room), lots of light, wood floors throughout, big balcony in back with barbecue! Step away from shops & cafés.
Appartement  rénové , entièrement équipé, pouvant accueillir 3 personnes. Chambre avec un lit queen et un divan-lit au salon. À proximité du métro Jarry, de l'École de Cirque et du Cirque du Soleil.

Clean, bright and spacious bedroom in the Mile-End/Plateau. The room has a double bed, a large closet, and a desk. Découvrez Montréal avec un pied à terre confo et décoré avec goût. Proche du métro ligne orange, de plusieurs bus et à une dizaines de minutes à pieds du superbe parc Laurier. Un bel appartement à Outremont , situé devant un parc et une piscine à 1 minute de la station de métro Outremont.  Le quartier est magnifique au niveau de l'architecture et des parcs.  L'accès à une épicerie, pharmacie, café, boulangerie,.... Nous sommes tout près du Mont-Royal, accessible pour aller marcher ou faire du vélo. Le logement est très confortable et tranquille. In a nice location, in the center of the island of Montreal, close to public transportation, grocery stores.  Big new condo, all furnished, all new. Beautiful modern apartment with panoramic views of downtown Montreal, for 4 people. Ideal for couples, families or business travelers.

Our bright modern and Scandinavian style apartment is located in the Rosemont Petite-Patrie neighbourhood, with free parking in the street. Getting to the famous Little Italy and it's many restaurants and renowned Marché Jean-Talon - a popular food market stocked with local food products and Quebec specialties - is just a stroll away. Room with storage space, next to two metro stations, couple of minutes from outdoor market & park, nice neighborhood. Access to the kitchen, living room, yard, washer, dryer. The apartment (6 1/2) is occupied by two roommates, a boy and a girl.

Magnifique 4 1/2 au coeur du Plateau, coin Duluth et avenue Laval. Parfaitement rénové, propre et luxueux. Tout est à notre portée que ce soit sur les rues Duluth, St-Denis et St-Laurent.  L'appartement est entièrement meublé et tout est compris incluant notamment hammack, machine à espresso, et tout ce qu'il faut pour cuisiner. C'est un logement épuré et zen. Il y a une ambiance calme et des voisins très respectueux. J'ai un balcon devant et un derrière qui permettent de profiter du soleil en prenant son verre!  My place is pure and zen. It's calm and my neighbours are respectful. I have a balcony in front and at the back of the appartement that you can enjoy the sun with a drink!

It’s a old and simple 3 bedrooms apartment but very comfortable,close to the metro Crémazie (8 min walking) and 5 minutes driving to the Marché Central.   The Parc Henri Julien is the backyard. You’ll share the apartment with me and my roomate Regis,i hope you enjoy your stay :)

Charmant 5 et demi au rez-de-chaussée(pas de voisins a l'étage d'en bas) dans le quartier Rosemont  la petite patrie.2 Places de stationnement à l'arrière. Milton Parc Hotel  is definitely the reference type Loft Design Hotel in the heart of  Montreal. It is perfectly located at the corner of rue Parc and Milton, less than 3 minutes away from the Place des Arts and Mont Royal Park.

Mon appartement est au rez-de-chaussée qui donne sur un petit jardin.  Il est à 7 min de marche du métro. Un bus est à l angle de la rue et une station de vélo à 100 mètres. Très proche de bars, Intermarchés et pharmacie. Il se situe dans un quartier calme.

Charmant studio refait à neuf au cœur du Plateau Mont-Royal à 5 minutes à pieds des stations de métro Mont-Royal et Laurier. Accès à la cour extérieure.

Our place is lovely and perfectly located to visit Montreal. It combines comfort from a recent building and charm from a true Montreal neighborhood. Great for a familly of 4 or 2 couples. Very close from subway station, many stores and restaurants.

Big sunny appartment in the heart of Montréal (Le Plateau, Mile-End), 5 minutes to Laurier metro station (Orange line, bus 47, 30, 46). Very quite street with lot of cafes, restaurants, boutiques and supermarkets around. The kitchen is very well equipped, washing machine and dryer available, and high-speed wifi. You can enjoy taking your breakfast or a drink on the terrace. A big double room with a queen size bed and available one comfortable queen size inflatable mat.

A sunny hideaway is tucked in the heart of the Plateau! This vintage space contains ornate crown moldings, rustic oak floors, a big kitchen with gas stove, and quiet balcony. It's a rock's throw from Laurier Park, grocery stores, restos, and shops.

Historic Boutique Hotel in Old Montreal Originally home to the Hotel Richelieu, Maison Saint-Vincent is a Montreal landmark.  With a preserved exterior dating back to 1858, the allure of MSV is undeniable. Completely renovated, while maintaining the original charm, Maison Saint-Vincent is designed for independent traveler, professionals, and foodies.

Fully renovated well lit & stylishly furnished two bedroom street level apartment in the heart of lower Westmount.  Steps away from Villa Maria and Vendome metro, 3 minute walk to Sherbrooke west with it's high end restaurants and shops. A ten minute bus ride to downtown Montreal and ten minutes on foot to Monkland village.  Pet friendly with a gated back yard, where you can allow your dog or cat to roam free. Family friendly with potty training items and safe guarded for children.

Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel. - 24/7 support via text, email, or phone - Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided - Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive - Self check-in

Belle maison (duplex) avec grand jardin dans le quartier ville marie à Montréal. Proche de commerces et à 5 min à pieds du métro Frontenac. Tous les équipements, enceintes Bluetooth , télévision Netflix , laveuse sécheuse ...

This unique apartment is right across the street from the beautiful and vibrant Parc Lafontaine. Avenue Mont-Royal is a lively street and about a 5-minute walk away.
