I live alone here with my charismatic cat and chill bird, and am thrilled to rent out the spare room to house guests! Check-in is 3:00 PM local time and checkout is 12:00 PM local time.

Superbe maison sur 2 étages. 1er étage : 1 sdb ; espace ouvert donnant sur une cour intérieure. 2e étages : 2 chambres ;1sdb. La maison peut accueillir 4 personnes, au coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal. Épiceries, restos, bars se trouvent à 5 minutes de marche (rue Mont-royal et St-Denis). L'emplacement  est ideal, 2 métro à 5 min à pied (Laurier) et 7 min (Mont-Royal) À noter, du 8 avril 2019 à mi août 2019  des travaux de réfection sur la rue seront en cours du lundi au vendredi de 7am à 17h!
Cosy, with big intimate terrasse, super well located in the heart of le Plateau Mont-Royal for one person or a couple.
Maison de ville spacieuse, moderne et très lumineuse situé dans le secteur Technopôle Angus dans Rosemont

A cozy private room in a luminous top floor apartment on “the most beautiful street in Montreal”. Walk Score 100.  The apartment is beside Parc Jeanne-Mance, walking distance to downtown and Mcgill,  and located between main streets Saint Laurent and Parc avenue.  Express bus 1 minute away.  Guests in my home have access to shared kitchen, living room and bathroom where all basics are provided and there is ultra high speed wifi.

Selected for its ideal location and fully-customized to meet the Simplissimmo standard, guests staying at the Pierce benefit from easy self check-in using codes and an electronic keypad, a ground floor convenience store for any last-minute needs, and affordable nearby parking for those with a car.

Private bedroom in a modern and very comfortable apartment in the heart of Montreal, close to The Village. However, our guests have access to the microwave and refrigerator to warm up a drink and store things in a cool place. Quiet neighborhood.

Large three room apartment situated in the Plateau Mont-Royal (in the heart of the city). A large terrace at the back allows you to eat outside. The apartment is furnished, washer and dryer, complete bedding and wifi.

Room in a lovely two-bedroom apartment near the Olympic Stadium in Montreal. Located on a quiet, tree-lined street with shopping nearby. Seven minutes on foot to the subway station (L'Assomption & Cadillac stations ) and a 10 minute ride to the heart of downtown. Close to many major attractions (Olympic Stadium, Biodôme, Botanical Garden, Insectarium, Planetarium, Soccer stadium, etc.) and easily accessible by the highway. Convertible bed for a second person if needed. Air-conditioned apartment.

I've been hosting on airbnb for 7 years. Found a landlord who is OK with me renting out the extra 2 rooms.  Place is almost finished, your room all painted, though still need some art up!  AMAZING LOCATION, freshly painted, beautiful King pillowtop bed, private room measuring a 12 ft by 15 ft with a window facing Clark St on Sherbrooke . No kitchen but there is a fridge, coffee, cereal, some snacks. Shared bathroom with me and one other airbnb room.  Cat on site.

-Appartement paisible au coin de la rue Mont-Royal  -Proche du Parc Lafontaine et du Parc Laurier -7 minutes de marche du Métro Mont-Royal -En face de la piste cyclable -Près de toutes les commodités (restaurants, bars, épiceries, pharmacie) -Stationnement gratuit sur la rue -2 chambres fermées,  1 bureau fermé. -Charmant balcon privé -Cuisine fonctionnelle, Wifi, laveuse-sécheuse -L'appartement est au deuxième étage d'un building de trois appartement.

A beautiful townhouse located in the quaint neighbourhood of Pointe St Charles. I am a circus artist, in and out of town for work with a house that loves company and stories. The bus passes frequently right in front on the house, and we are 10 minutes from Charlevoix metro.
Jolie chambre dans un paisible et chaleureux appartement situé sur le plateau Mont-Royal, tout près du Parc Lafontaine et de l'avenue Mont-Royal.

Spacious studio in the middle of downtown with a great view of montreal architectural center. Bienvenue dans le quartier du Plateau dans un appartement typiquement montréalais. Nous vous proposons notre logement de 100 m2 comprenant 2 chambres et un bureau. Appartement lumineux et propre et entrée privée, avec tout les articles nécessaires, a 5 min du centre ville, bien situé, pour les familles qui ont des petits, approximite des garderies privés.

Appart cosy et CENTRAL au cœur du plateau, à l’angle de la célèbre avenue Mont-Royal où vous pourrez profiter de la vie de quartier animé et agréable. Nice functional room for long or short term stays. Sunny and bright shared appt with two other lively persons. Nearby public transit to easy downtown transportation.  Many services around, bakery, groceries etc.

This is an apartment I keep for out of town guests and when I have no one I put it on Airbnb. The furniture is super modern and I try to make sure I have all the comforts of home. I always open to suggestions if you think something is missing. Also very important and I can’t stress it enough- my tenant downstairs is the « Casa del Habano » they are probably one of the last places in Montreal where you can smoke indoors. Mile-End is conveniently located in the heart of Montreal walking distance from the Mont Royal, Plateau-Mont-Royal, Downtown, and the more upscale shopping district on Laurier street. Discreet speakeasies, quaint coffee shops, upscale bars and clubs, delicious bakeries, specialty chocolatiers, and unique restaurants for all budgets are just a few blocks away. • Very comfortable, one bedroom apartment. • In the heart of Old Montreal. • Features lots of natural light through its large windows. • Offers ample storage space and an indoor fire place.

The apartment is a 1 bedroom (king size bed) apartment with living room , full kitchen and bathroom. Can accommodate up to 2 people. Linens and blankets will be provided. Closet in living room can be used for your personal it

Discover this beautiful and large contemporary apartment fully equipped, and enjoy the charms of Montreal easily, conveniently located close to transport, a few meters walk from the shops of the Beaubien street and 14 minutes from the city center (walk score 91/100). 2 large double bedrooms, an open kitchen, a fully equipped living room, a large bathroom and a private terrace with BBQ to meet your needs.

Our place is close to Beaubien Metro Station, Cafes, Restaurants and Shops. A perfect base from which to explore classic Montreal neighbourhoods such as Le Plateau, Mile End and Little Italy. Just 15 min walk to Jean-Talon Market.  Bright inside and sunny out the back on our lovely terrace. We look forward to sharing our home with you.

Nice 4 1/2 apartment two steps away from Laurier Station and Laurier Park! Great location to go downtown, to chill at the park, to go to restaurants and bars!  Two bedrooms with 1 Queen bed and one double bed, plus, there is a sofa bed in the living room that can be use be one or two more people. Warm, lovely house located in a quiet street of Rosemont-La-Petite-Patrie, a sought-after neighbourhood of Montreal. Find comfort in a typical lower half of a duplex with finished basement, close to all services. Le Mile-End, endroit par excellence pour vivre l'expérience montréalaise. Mur de pierre et du cachet a revendre. Passer du temps dans cet appartement est simplement le summum du bonheur. A computer can be used in the family room with high speed wifi. Make your life easier and enjoyable.new air conditioner have been installed.

Bright, modern space with big balcony and amazing east-facing view of the city. Located right next to the mountain and many parks (including Tam Tams on Sundays). Humble et confortable, cet appartement est situé dans l’un des quartiers les plus colorés de Montréal. My place is in a good location that is 3 minutes away from the Joliette Metro Station, then you are just a few stations to Downtown, Old Montreal and the Festival Place. Studio is located 1 min walk from guy- concordia metro, 5-7m walk from all bars/club and restaurants.  The apartment includes a kitchen and a bathroom. Hi there! We are a couple in our late twenties living together with two very nice and clean cats in a great area of Montreal. Our place is a 30 second walk from Villa Maria metro station. Cozy Apartment in The Heart of Downtown Montreal at the crossroads of mountain serenity and fast-paced city life. Coquet 3 et demie (1 salon, 1 cuisine, 1 chambre et une salle de bain) situé en plein coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal et à 3 rues du Mile End soit les deux plus beaux quartiers de Montréal. You'll be in the middle of it all , Restos , patios, boutiques , arts/events , market etc. and only a stone throw away from Downtown , Old Montreal , mile end, the Mount Royal mountain and more.

Ce grand logement de 1600 pi2 est situé dans un immeuble historique au coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal à 2 min. à pied du métro Mont-Royal et de toutes les commodités.  Description du logement :  2 chambres fermées avec lit queen ; cuisine entièrement équipée ; grande pièce ouverte avec salle à dîner et salon avec foyer ;  grande salle de bain spacieuse ; salle de lavage ; grande balcon avant et terrasse arrière.

Cottage in front of the Olympic Stadium at five minutes walk to metro Pie-IX, the Biodome and the Botanical Garden. Amazing view and threes in a very quiet family friendly neighborhoods (gated entrance for the cars).  Two parking spaces a lot more...

Apparemment situé au cuoer du centre-ville de Montréal. À proximité de tout le commerce, musées, restaurants, clubs, places touristiques. Fourni d'une salle de lavage,  piscine, salle de gym et dépanneur sur place.  Propre, spacieux, agréable, 16eme étage avec un très belle vue de la ville depuis l'appart et la terrasse. Pharmacie, épicerie, station de métro, SAQ ETC a moins de deux coins de rue  Parfais pour businessmen, famille, couple ou amis. pas d,animaux accepté  pas de fumeurs no parties

Bright charming room with private balcony in character 1920s style 3 bedroom apartment with hardwood floors, high ceilings and mouldings. Located on a quiet street steps from Jean-Talon metro, Jean-Talon market and Little Italy. Cute kitchen with espresso machine and ample storage. Two living rooms with antique furnishings and a decent record collection. Washing machine and bicycle available. I share this apartment with my girlfriend and our cat.

Cozy and bright private room in the Plateau Mont-Royal.  The apartment is very well located, 4 min from the metro station Sherbrooke, 3 min from many buses, close to many facilities (restaurants, markets, bars)  and to avenue Mont-Royal, rue Saint-Denis, Duluth. Parc La Fontaine is only at 5 min walking.  You will share the kitchen, living room and the bathroom with the other roomates. The room and the location are perfect to visit and enjoy Montreal !

This family friendly apartment is located in a quiet fourplex, next to the Montreal Int'l airport, a spacious 2 bedroom apartment with large backyard.  Perfect for 1 or 2 and up to 8 guests. Approx. 20-25 minute drive to Downtown Montreal. Although a car is recommended, easy access to bus service and a 5 minutes walk to train station. Perfect for travelling families. full size kitchen & bathroom. Free parking. I live in the same complex so I can be easily reached. Rentals for 31 days + welcome.

Hello ! We offer you our very modern loft (half basement but very bright), in the heart of the popular district of Plateau Mont Royal. Located east of Mount Royal, the Plateau is one of the most pleasant neighborhoods to live. Lots of entertainment, diversity of shops, parks and very well connected. Ideal location to visit Montreal. Metro: Mont Royal (Orange) 4 min by walk Bus: 4 lines Bixi: (rental bike) 3 stations < 2 min by walk La Fontaine Park: 5 min by walk Nous parlons aussi Français

Appartement spacieux et chaleureux, avec boiseries et parquets. 1 chambre avec lit double, une chambre avec des lits simples superposés, un salon comprenant un canapé et un fauteuil convertible en lit simple très confortable. La cuisine est équipée de tout le nécessaire pour cuisiner. Terrasse spacieuse, partagée avec un voisin charmant.

The room is close to downtown. Enjoy my apartment for the location, area and outdoor spaces. My accommodation is perfect for solo travelers. In the appartment we are 2 roomates and there is a little room with a simple bed, there is no window in the room but ou have access to the kitchen and the living room. It's perfect for people who wants to visit montreal or have a place temporarly  in downtown next to everything like old port, plateau mont-royal, parcs, bars and nightclubs.

Room #1 of the apartment  locates in a convenient residential neigborhood in southwest region (Verdun) of Montreal island, close grocery stores, park, Metro/Subway Station and different restaurants. This place is perfect for visitors, business travelers and new arrivals. We are looking forward to offer service during your trip.

Newly built (2016) studio, located downtown, near Saint-Catherine street East and within walking distance to Saint-Laurent metro station. Restaurants, bars, etc. Short walk to ChinaTown & Old Port. Suitable for 1 or 2 people (double bed), but possible to fit up to 4 people because of the sofa bed. High-speed Wifi, no cable TV but smart TV (Netflix, youtube). Air Conditioning (ideal in summer). The studio is 4min away from the bus stop to go to the Airport. Building amenities include a gym.

Bel appartement avec le charme des maisons d’Outremont.  Magnifique Quartier, a un coin de rue de la rue Bernard, avec ses restaurants et boutiques. A proximité de magnifiques parcs et du Mort Royal.  Quelques minutes pour le centre ville. Disponible pour Location au mois.

4 mn by foot from metro in downtown Montreal, close to parks, groceries, etc. in a beautiful street, a spacious appartment, well equiped (washer dryer tv kitchen fridge wifi...), with 2 bedrooms (1 with double bed, 1 with 2 single beds) and a bed/couch in living room. Except for some periods the location is for long stays, according to the regulation. Don't hesitate to communicate with us! We are impatient to hear from you!
Experience a month in downtown Montreal this Summer!

Berri-UQAM metro station. Located In the heart of downtown, right next to chinatown and old Montreal Live a few steps from the quartier des spectacles and make the most of summer festivals Within walking distance of restaurants,cafes,bars,shops,grocery stores, parcs,cinemas, pharmacies The area is very lively. The Loft is where everyone contributes to its vibrant energy. Fresh Verbena, Basil and Mint always available. Contact me!

Bonjour. Je vous propose une chambre dans un appartement de deux chambres. La chambre est très éclairée avec une grande fenêtre. Appartement lumineux et chaleureux, situé au centre de Montréal. Grace à une ligne express juste au pied de l'appartement vous êtes proche de tout. Le parc Lafontaine et le coeur du quartier du Plateau sont accessibles rapidement à pied.

Belle grande chambre avec beaucoup de rangements, grand lit confortable,porte avec serrure à clé pour la sécurité de vos biens. La literie, les serviettes et bien d'autres commodités sont fournies. Metro Georges Vanier  Metro Lionel Groulx Belle chambre dans un bel appartement au Centre ville de Montréal.  Excellente localisation! Nice room in a cool apartment in downtown Montréal. Great location!
chambre privée spacieuse avec espace de travail

Our house is located in the most charming neighborhood of Montreal (Little Burgundy). This is one of the 4 rooms in an apartment located on Saint-Urbain street. This room has a queen bed that comes with a desk, dresser and closet for your things. Our apartment has 2 balconies, living room, kitchen, laundry machines and is a great place for those who want to explore one of Montreal's most popular neighborhoods!

Over 1,000 perfect 5-star reviews across all of our properties. Originally built as a hotel in the 1820s, this loft remains in Montreal's absolute best location. It is beautifully furnished and equipped with daily essentials (netflix, coffee, toiletries, etc.) to ensure you feel at home. This boutique apartment also comes with a virtual concierge, ready to assist you with any request.

This bright three-bedroom semi basement has all essentials for you to rest in a quiet community where you have a quick access to urban park and water front. Magnifique Appartement situé au coeur de Hochelaga dans un secteur en plein embourgeoisement à proximité de tout les commodités Restaurant, Bar, Marché, Transport et Boutique. Venez vous détendre dans ce chaleureux appartement !

Bright, 2-bedroom Heritage Apartment, Steps away from the Jean Talon Market. 2 Balconies, Renovated 100-year Triplex, Quiet Street in Montreal’s most Vibrant Neighborhood. The City’s Best Food, Drink, Coffee and Produce from all over Québec.

- Fully furnished apartment in the heart of downtown Montreal - WIFI (high speed internet), stove, refrigerator, heating, hot water and necessary furniture are included - Near Concordia University, Mcgill University, Université de Montréal, Lassale College, HEC, UQAM, Metro Guy Concordia, hospitals & restaurant  - Indoor parking available on demand

Our home welcomes everybody!  We've done airbnb as guests and now is our turn to do it as hosts. The apartment is big and cosy, it is newly renovated, has a huge backyard and it has an amazing location!

Cute 3-1/2, 2nd floor. Comfortable, cozy, yet spacious oasis that can easily accommodate up to 3 guests.  Neighborhood is surrounded by all services pertinent to travelers....shopping center, restaurants, dry cleaner, laundromat, bus stop, and most importantly subway (Metro) just one street corner up.

Remodeled house in Montreal's prestigious  neighborhood.  Main floor in a duplex  (1450 SF) and a finished basement (450 SF) with a full bathroom in Westmount's hottest area. Welcome to the Funk Room! Marc and Julie and our cat Smokey welcome guests from all over the world to our funky, airy 2-floor apartment in the lovely Villeray neighbourhood, only a 5-minute walk from Fabre metro station! Nous parlons français aussi!
Second floor in duplex Very close to Metro Monkland village steps away

17th floor 1 bedroom with a great view.  Downtown and the Plateau (arts district) is a short bus ride away.  Close to restaurants, cafes, and gourmet grocers. Nice functional room for long or short term stays. Sunny and bright shared appt with skylight and three other lively persons. Nearby public transit to easy downtown transportation.  Many services around, bakery, groceries etc.

Charming one bedroom in St Henri.  5 minute walk to metro, canal and incredible restaurants, coffee shops, boutiques. This is the foodie mecca of Montreal. 10 minute walk to Atwater Market. Fabulous 2 bedroom apartment great for relaxing after a long day visiting Montreal! My apartment is very clean & uncluttered. It will ensure anyone the best stay in Montreal!  -Comfy queen size bed. -Fully functional kitchen. -Free WIFI -Close to all the attractions and hip bars, restaurants and clubs

This beautiful  Condo is located in the heart of Montreal and the Old Port. My appartment is located near Iberville metro station. Steps from Jean-Talon, Bélanger  and Beaubien streets. Lovely parks, small restaurants nearby. Luxury apartment for 2 or 3 people (futon in the living room). One block away from  Jean-Talon subway and a few blocks away from Jean-Talon market. Condo ensoleillé et entièrement rénové pour 2 ou 3 personnes (futon-lit dans le salon) situé à un coin de rue du métro Jean-Talon et à quelques minutes à pied du  marché Jean-Talon. Perfect location in the Mile End. Our Accomodation is on L`avenue Mont-Royal located at the heart of the Plateau Mont-Royal, 5min Walk from Mont-Royal metro station,Close to bars,bistro,micro brewery, very good resto and cafe. 10 min of our beautiful park of the Royal mountain you will be two steps of any commodity. Charmant condo avec une chambre à coucher, très bien situé, location parfaite pour visiter Montréal.

Exceptional location near downtown and metro station: comfort without compromise, in Verdun. Beautiful and modern house with a large garden, parking spot. Very functional and fully equipped. 5.5 Apartment for Rent in Montreal, Mile End. Located on Jeanne Mance Street, close to Bernard Avenue. Very green and quiet hood. Five minute walk to great restaurants, bars, cafes and shopping. Minutes walk to a number of bus lines and a Bixi station.

Near subway/Metro, local distilleries, Park Mont-Royal and Park La Fontaine, the gay village and downtown as well as several renowed  restaurants such as  L'Avenue, la Banquise, St-Viateur Bagel and Barraca Rhumerie & Tapas. Joli appartement avec de la personnalité dans le quartier HOMA à 5 minutes à pied du métro "Joliette" sur la ligne verte (ligne direct pour le centre ville, soit 10 minutes) . Quartier calme proche de toutes commodités ( épicerie, bar, restaurant, laverie, bus et métro)

Spacious apartment with 2 Closed Bedrooms and with a Queen-sized pull out couch in the living room. 10 minute walk from St Henri Metro Station. 2 Minute walk from Bars and Restaurants in trendy St Henri neighbourhood. Sip wine to unwind and/or plan to take over the city at night in this newly renovated historical brick-walled condo near the Old Port, the Village and 150 feet from Montreal's main subway station (Berri-UQAM). In order to facilitate better communication with travelers and considering that I do not speak English, I prefer to welcome people who speak French - Pour une petite fête (anniversaire, sweet16, mariage, ...) ou un souper d'amis. Charming apartment of 111 m2 in the quiet district of Hochelaga where there are many shops. This accommodation can accommodate up to 4 people and has two closed bedrooms. Bright and spacious apartment with 2 large balconies Close to Laurier metro station and Mont-Royal plateau Newly renovated apartment, it is fully equipped for 4 people. Bedroom with a window facing the Parc La Fontaine, best place to picnic, walk, run or meditate by the waterfall. Lucky guests - you are staying in the best place in all of Montreal and every single fun thing to do is less than 5 minutes walk from your front door. Modern and sunny boho apartment located downtown Montreal. The place is 1 min away from metro station and steps away from all you could need : supermarket, shopping centres, restaurant, pharmacy and bars/clubs.

This charming Bed & Breakfast apartment building, built in 1855 and newly restored, is convenient, bright and comfortable. Located in Point St Charles, Montreal's second oldest area only to the old port, it includes a charming deck for the summer and a fully equipped interior. Only 9 min walk to the subway, or a few minute drive to downtown and the old port, it’s well situated yet quiet. There are a variety of restaurants, bars and parks accessible by foot, also plenty of free street parking.

Hosted listing.  Large 2 bedroom house comfortable for 2-4 people.   Please note that I have a very friendly English Cocker Spaniel. If dogs are a plus for you then this is the place for you. I’ll help you find things to do around town, make sure everything stays tidy, Food is not included but I make coffee in the morning and share whatever I’m cooking from the garden or bread machine.

Spacious and clean apartment in the heart of Montreal ! Our cozy well located fully equipped  bachelor is a must when visiting our great city. This apartment has its own private entrace and you do not share the space with anyone. Our home is for living in! Apartment located in Monkland Ave where is organized well. There are so much  place like famous bakery, restaurants within walking distance. Superb, completely new apartment, built in 2016 in the heart of the City Center of Montreal with access on foot to the Quartier des Spectacles. Bright and spacious apartment in Rosemont neighborhood by the Pere Marquette Park. Located 10 minutes walking distance from Rosemont metro station, this apartement offers 2 closed bedrooms and spacious living room, kitchen and a balcony facing south.

Comfy,  1 bedroom, 1 living room, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom. Size 50m2 (550sqf). Private entrance. Convenient, simple, clean and charming. Great neighborhood life. Modern decor with an amazing view of Downtown Montreal. Centrally located minutes away from everything you will need. Metro’s, restaurants, bars, clubs, shopping and much more. 2 smart Tv’s with YouTube, Netflix capabilities and much more. 99 Walk Score.

L’appartement est situé juste à côté du supermarché, d’un Jean-Coutu, du marché Jean-Talon ainsi que d’un dépanneur (épicier) placé juste de l’autre côté de la rue. Tu partageras l’appartement avec un étudiant, sportif, sérieux, calme et respectueux. Disponible de Juin à fin Août.

Venez séjourner dans notre appartement très chaleureux, cosy avec toutes les commodités à proximité et également la Rue Wellington qui est très animée jour et nuit. Vous allez adorer le magnifique quartier qui est l'un des plus beaux de Montréal avec le métro qui est situé à 10 min à pied, Vous pourrez rejoindre le centre ville très rapidement. It is a modern apartment located between Sherbrooke metro and La Fontaine park! In addition, at the corner of the street you will find a supermarket and a coffee shop. All inclusive - internet, Bell TV, electric fireplace, laundry room. Possibility of free parking on request, depending on availability and weather conditions (if there is no snow).

Mon logement est situé à Verdun, tout près du Centre-Ville de Montréal. Vous l'apprécierez pour les trésors du quartiers, les restaurants, les épiceries et marchés, la rue Wellington, les parcs au bord du Fleuve St-Laurent et la proximité des transports en commun. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples et les voyageurs en solo.

I wasn't really looking to move when I visited this Apt, but I fell in love with the energy, the space, the old-fashioned attractiveness, the light & the comfort that this place offered. Every room has been freshly painted, light renovations have been made & most of my furniture & appliances are new. The apt is 6 blocks from the metro, 3 from the supermarket & there is always street parking available. I am looking to rent out the 'white' room once in a while to friendly and respectful people.

Beautiful home in the heart of Montreal's vibrant Plateau neighbourhood.vintage walls and floors yet lots of modern addons for ultimate comfort.first floor, well lit, huge kitchen and bath.cute comfy room and right next to the parc. Close to a beautiful stretch of Laurier st. 15-17 min walk to different subways, laurier parc and Plenty of micro brews and coffeeshops to enjoy. I stay at the place when i need to do some work and chilling and rent it when i stay at the gf's Place not far from here

Heart of artsy Mile-End. You will discover the charming coffee shops with live music, the nice bars and nice restaurants of the streets nearby : Saint Viateur, Bernard and Saint Laurent. Mile End is really special, you will feel home !

I keep a neat and minimalist apartment with well chosen items and curated furniture. This place works particularly well for a small group of friends or for a small family visiting Montreal. There are plenty of nice restaurants within walking distance between the Sommerled and Monkland village areas. We are not far from the downtown core: 25 minutes by car or bike, 45 minutes by metro/bus (during rush hour). When not renting on AirBnB, I do live in the space.

- Fully furnished apartment in the heart of downtown Montreal - WIFI (high speed internet), stove, refrigerator, air conditioning , heating, hot water and necessary furniture are included - Near Concordia University, Mcgill University, Université de Montréal, Lassale College, HEC, UQAM, Metro Guy Concordia, hospitals & restaurant  - Indoor parking available on demand

Appart au plateau Mont-Royal,   3 chambres fermées avec  lits Queens + 1 divan lit au salon. Tout équipé (wifi, TV). Joli, très lumineux et bien équipé. À deux pas  de la Rue Mont-Royal et de tous les services.

The apartment is small but comfortable. The bed is very comfy and the room is super relaxing :)The couch in the living room can also become a comfy single bed. Studio apartment; comes with a Queen size bed, Lcd smart Tv 40", full kitchen, full bathroom, table/desk, chairs, drawers, plates, pots and pans, linen set, towel set. Private room in a 10 1/2 room apartment, we have 7 bedrooms. we share the living room (with TV and DVD player). a very large kitchen and the bathroon and a toilet room separate. also we have a nice sunny balcony.
这是一栋独立公寓,上下两层独立的公寓,Plex是当地独有特色!您将入住的是楼上单独的一套公寓!三个卧室,一个洗手间,一个厨房餐厅,一个客厅｡我们距离地铁站非常近,走路大概五分钟,周边环境很安静,但整个区域避免不了飞机的声音,睡眠环境要求极高的请绕行.公寓不远就是教堂,周末就可以听到好听的钟声!公寓附近有游泳池,公园,球场,超市,图书馆(目前装修中),饭店,小型商业街!
It is my pleasure to welcome you to my charming apartment with balcony ideally located in trendy Mile End.  Close to restaurants, bars, cafés, shopping, transit and parks.

Nice studio for 2 persons available in Vileray, near Jarry's Park (Tennis international ).  Also in the same neighberhood as Jean-Talon's Market. Luminous and cozy 2 1/2  available July 01. 89/night hot water, electricity, stove and fridge included.

Condominium on three levels with two entrances from the street. Spacious entrance hall, English court from living room with garden furniture (east) and green shrub/grass. Quiet neighborhood, kind neighbors.

Beautiful condo with 2 closed bedrooms in Rosemont area. Closed to supermarket, bus and metro station and fully equipped for your stay in Montreal. This is the perfect place to discover this vibrant city! Available from September 7th to 21st, 2018.

Small house in the center of Rosemont Petite-Patrie, near all services. Master bedroom with queen bed and second room with double bed. Kitchen with all utilities. Chambre dans une colocation chaleureuse en plein centre-ville, idéal pour découvrir Montréal. Situé à 5 min à pied de deux stations de métro. Près des commerces, restaurants et bars. Tout peut se faire à pied.

NO PETS. NO SMOKING. NO PARTIES. NO EXTRA GUESTS. Large spacious home in a quiet neighborhood. Not equipped for children under 12. Full bathroom and shower. In the vibrant Plateau Mont-Royal, sunny and cozy bedroom in an comfortable apartment. Centrally located you will be near everything exciting in the city. Outstanding restaurants and bars, shopping area and outdoor activities.

Great view. One Bedroom with a queen bed. Right next to Mcgill campus. Groceries shopping below the building (La Cite Appartments). 5 minutes from Place des Arts metro. Bus n# 80 right in front of the building.

Studio located in the heart of the Village area, near two majors subway stations, Lafontaine Park and the famous neighbourhood Le Plateau. For small and functional space's lover. Our one-bedroom apartment offers you a place to relax, have fun and truly unwind from a long day of work. They have been renovated and feature modern and comfortable decor. Located in Downtown Montreal within walking distance to the Mount-Royal Mountain, McGill & Concordia Universities, bus & metro stations, shopping malls, hotels, and nightlife.

La chambre d'invités chez moi est un espace calme et relaxant que j'ai pris soin d'aménager de sorte que tous s'y sentent à l'aise. Elle comprend un espace de travail, un coin lecture, un petit garde-robe et un beau grand lit confortable. Le mur du fond est entièrement fenestré et beigne la pièce d'une douce lumière toute la journée et nous laisse apercevoir les beaux grands arbres du quartier. À 30min du centre ville, près du metro Beaubien et dans un quartier effervescent et chaleureux!

Bedroom in apartment located in the heart of the trendy «Plateau Mont Royal»  next to a park and near the famous Mont-Royal street. It is a clean but unpretentious housing with some traces of wear. Logement propre mais sans prétention avec quelques traces d'usures. Idéal pour ceux veulent un hébergement à faible coût.
The "POP!" room is a bright and airy place with an all-white decor accented by splashes oh-so bright pop-art colors.

Centrally located, in downtown Montreal. 5 min walk from place des arts, 2 min from Mcgill, 12 min walk from old port and 7 min from st-catherine. Bus and metro very close! 1 bedroom, one queen bed and 1 simple. 2 confortable sofas! Amazing view from balcony.

La chambre est de taille relativement petite mais la décoration est très épurée donc la place ne manque pas! Beaucoup de luminaires pour masquer l'absence de fenêtre et les couleurs claires égaient la pièce. C'est une petite pièce très calme, isolée du bruit extérieur. La chambre comprend 1 grande commode et une penderie, un lit 2 places et un grand bureau (table de chevet, miroir,chaise). L'appartement est très grand et spacieux . Très chaleureux, convivial et particulièrement lumineux.

Stylish apartment renovated as a 2-split level loft, tastefully furnished, and fully equipped. Embrace the soothing aesthetics of this tastefully revamped home. The unit features a monochromatic all-white interior, a pop of color, an open-plan layout, chic furnishings and decor, and a terrace with a covered outdoor dining space.
Make the most of your stay in Montreal with this splendid 100m2 spacious, assiduously decorated and perfectly equipped!

MONTREAL THEMED APARTMENT...  A great apartment in the multicultural city of Montreal. All guests are welcome to stay with Chez Sarah! Very sunny, Montreal experience at its best. Charming apartment of La Petite-Patrie, fully furnished. Large private terrace with nice views. 10 minutes from the Rosemont metro and 20 minutes from downtown. Close to all services!

Nice studio, ideal for a couple.  Amazing location, in the heart of the city!  Quick access to metros and buses. 2 minutes away from Place des Arts. 2 minutes walk to Provigo (supermarket) The studio is in the heart of city and minutes away from shops, bars, cafés and restaurants.

Nous avons mis tout notre coeur pour créer un endroit ou vous vous sentirez chez vous, confortable et en sécurité. Tout a été fraîchement rénové. La déco est originale et artistique.
